prompt:
Identify the intent classes from the given user query, delimited with ####. Intents are categorized into two levels: main intent and sub intent. In your response, provide only ONE set of main and sub intents that is most relevant to the query. Write your response ONLY in this format <main-intent>:<sub-intent>. ONLY Write the intention.

OUTPUT EXAMPLE:
profile_update:contact_info

OUTPUT EXAMPLE:
technical_support:portal_navigation

#### QUERY:
{query}
####
